data.comment: Today's referee, Armando Villarreal, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 1, Dominique Badji puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Dax McCarty.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 3, Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
George Bello (Atlanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 4, Atlanta to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 7, Armando Villarreal signals a Atlanta throw-in in Nashville's half.
Can Atlanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Nashville, close to Atlanta's area.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Atlanta at Nissan Stadium.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
In the minute 14, Throw-in Atlanta.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Atlanta.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
In the minute 16, Abu Danladi of Nashville gets in a strike, but is off target.
Armando Villarreal awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Free kick Atlanta.
In the minute 18, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Jeff Larentowicz (Atlanta) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Ezequiel Barco with an assist there.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Nashville.
Nashville push upfield but Armando Villarreal quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Atlanta at Nissan Stadium.
Nashville take a 2-1 lead thanks to Hany Mukhtar.
Great play from Dominique Badji to set up the goal.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 32, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in Nashville.
In the minute 33, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville.
Dax McCarty scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 3-1.
Daniel Lovitz instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Dax McCarty of Nashville smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 40, Atlanta's Ezequiel Barco misses with an attempt on goal.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a Atlanta throw-in in Nashville's half.
In the minute 43, Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
The first-half is over at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Jurgen Damm is on a sub for Brooks Lennon for Atlanta.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Atlanta.
In the minute 50, Atlanta are pushing forward but Jeff Larentowicz's finish is wide of the goal.
Armando Villarreal awards Nashville a goal kick.
Jurgen Damm (Atlanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 52, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Adam Jahn's header is off-target for Atlanta.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Atlanta at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Nashville.
In Nashville Atlanta attack through Jurgen Damm. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 56, Nashville have a goal kick.
Stephen Glass is making the team's second substitution at Nissan Stadium with Eric Remedi replacing Tyler Wolff.
The away team replace Matheus Rossetto with Jon Gallagher.
In the minute 57, Goal! Abu Danladi extends Nashville's lead to 4-1.
That's a fine assist from Dax McCarty.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
In the minute 59, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Goal! George Bello pulls one back to make it 4-2.
In the minute 61, Adam Jahn with an assist there.
Nashville make their first substitution with Alan Winn replacing Alex Muyl.
Taylor Washington is replacing Abu Danladi for the home team.
In the minute 63, Free kick Nashville.
Atlanta's Eric Remedi has been booked in Nashville.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 64, Nashville have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlanta in Nashville.
Atlanta's Eric Remedi breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Armando Villarreal awards Nashville a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Nashville needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Nashville.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Nashville.
In Nashville, Atlanta push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 75, The away team replace Adam Jahn with Erick Torres.
Nashville make their third substitution with Derrick Jones replacing Hany Mukhtar.
Daniel Rios is on a sub for Dominique Badji for Nashville.
In the minute 75, Stephen Glass (Atlanta) is making a fourth substitution, with Jake Mulraney replacing Jurgen Damm.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Nashville drive upfield and Derrick Jones gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlanta defender.
In the minute 77, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Nashville.
In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, Free kick Atlanta.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Armando Villarreal signals a Nashville throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 85, Important block from the Nashville defence as Erick Torres fires in a strike for Atlanta.
Erick Torres for Atlanta drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Dax McCarty with Brian Anunga. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gary Smith.
Free kick in a good position for Atlanta!
Nashville are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 89, Can Nashville capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Daniel Rios for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nashville.
Armando Villarreal awards Nashville a goal kick.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Nissan Stadium.
That's full-time at Nissan Stadium. The final score is 4-2.
